document.full_text: phil mickelson moved within one stroke of fellow american bill haas, the early second-round leader, by shooting a bogey-free 66 on friday at the quail hollow championship.
document.title: mickelson within one shot of leader haas at quail hollow
lines_and_colors: phil mickelson moved within one stroke of fellow american bill haas, the early second-round leader, by shooting a bogey-free 66 on friday at the quail hollow championship.
